attributes.action: Instruct elecricity suppliers  to give bigger discounts  to domestic consumers  who only have electrical supplies
attributes.additional_details:
Millions of homes  do not have a Gas supply. Probably for safety  reasons most if not all apartment blocks  do not have a gas supply.

Consumers who have both electric and a gas supply are offered  a "dual fuel"  discount.

This penalises  millions of people who only have ONE   fuel.

Will the government please look into this major problem?
Alternatively, Give  customers  with no gas supply   a ZERO  rate  of fuel tax.
